name: Pizza Delivery Simulator (Dog)
description:
***WIP*** Just a small Unity Project I'm working on, I've been delivering pizza's for the last 4 years but teaching myself how to code for the last 13. Any feed back is appreciated, sorry for any bugs/balance issues!

The bar on the bottom is your fuel, fuel is only burned while the cars engine is running.

You can go to the gas station and shut your engine off and pump gas if you've made enough with tips, and after a few paychecks ( 1 every 3 deliveries currently ) you can head to the garage for some upgrades that definitely need some balancing.
